required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Parent Training and Emotion Coaching for Children With Limited Prosocial Emotions
clinical_study.official_title: Parent Training and Emotion Coaching for Children With Limited Prosocial Emotions

brief_summary.textblock: The proposed research will focus on the development of a brief emotion-coaching (EC) parenting program (which directly targets child emotion awareness/recognition and affective empathy), that will be combined with a well-established parent management training program (Helping the Noncompliant Child; HNC) for treating oppositional defiant disorder (ODD) in children who also have limited prosocial emotions (e.g., lack of guilt and empathy, callous use of others).

primary_outcome.measure: Eyberg Child Behavior Inventory - intensity score
primary_outcome.time_frame: Participants will be followed for the duration of outpatient treatment, an expected average of 25 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Child conduct problems at baseline, mid-treatment and post-treatment

primary_outcome.time_frame: Participants will be followed for the duration of outpatient treatment, an expected average of 25 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Change in child conduct problems for children ages 3-5 at baseline, mid-treatment and post-treatment

primary_outcome.time_frame: Participants will be followed for the duration of outpatient treatment, an expected average of 25 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Child conduct problems for children ages 6-7 at baseline, mid-treatment and post-treatment

primary_outcome.measure: Behavioral Coding System - percent child inappropriate behaviors
primary_outcome.time_frame: Participants will be followed for the duration of outpatient treatment, an expected average of 25 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Child inappropriate behaviors at baseline, mid-treatment and post-treatment

primary_outcome.measure: Behavioral Coding System percent child compliance
primary_outcome.time_frame: Participants will be followed for the duration of outpatient treatment, an expected average of 25 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Child compliance at baseline, mid-treatment and post-treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Inventory of Callous-Unemotional Traits - preschool version - total score
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Participants will be followed for the duration of outpatient treatment, an expected average of 25 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Callous-unemotional traits at baseline mid-treatment and post-treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: A Developmental Neuropsychological Assessment (NEPSY-II) Affect Recognition Task - fear recognition
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Participants will be followed for the duration of outpatient treatment, an expected average of 25 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Affect recognition at baseline, mid-treatment and post-treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: NEPSY-II Affect Recognition Task - sadness recognition
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Participants will be followed for the duration of outpatient treatment, an expected average of 25 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Affect recognition in baseline mid-treatment and post-treatment

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Participants will be followed for the duration of outpatient treatment, an expected average of 25 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Behavioral coding of Zahn-Waxler empathy paradigm - amount of attention, affective response congruent with examiner, concern for others, disregard for others
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Participants will be followed for the duration of outpatient treatment, an expected average of 25 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Behavioral Coding System - positive attention rate per minute
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Participants will be followed for the duration of outpatient treatment, an expected average of 25 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Parenting behavior - positive attention at baseline mid-treatment and post-treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Behavioral Coding System - total commands rate per minute
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Participants will be followed for the duration of outpatient treatment, an expected average of 25 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Change in parenting behavior - commands at baseline mid-treatment and post-treatment

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Participants will be followed for the duration of outpatient treatment, an expected average of 25 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Parenting at baseline mid-treatment and post-treatment

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Participants will be followed for the duration of outpatient treatment, an expected average of 25 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Parenting at baseline mid-treatment and post-treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Parent Meta-Emotion Interview emotion coaching scale
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Participants will be followed for the duration of outpatient treatment, an expected average of 25 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Emotion coaching at baseline and post-treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Parenting Sense of Competence satisfaction scale
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Participants will be followed for the duration of outpatient treatment, an expected average of 25 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Parenting satisfaction at baseline mid-treatment and post-treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Parenting Sense of Competence efficacy scale
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Participants will be followed for the duration of outpatient treatment, an expected average of 25 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Parenting efficacy at baseline mid-treatment and post-treatment

other_outcome.measure: Difficulties with Emotion Regulation Scale - lack of awareness and limited access to emotion regulation strategies
other_outcome.time_frame: Participants will be followed for the duration of outpatient treatment, an expected average of 25 weeks
other_outcome.description: Maternal emotion regulation abilities at baseline mid-treatment and post-treatment

other_outcome.time_frame: Participants will be followed for the duration of outpatient treatment, an expected average of 25 weeks
other_outcome.description: Maternal depression at baseline and post-treatment

arm_group.description: This intervention will combine a parent management training program called Helping the Noncompliant Child with elements of an Emotion Coaching parenting intervention.
This intervention will consist of a parent management training program called Helping the Noncompliant Child.

intervention.description: This intervention will combine a parent management training program called Helping the Noncompliant Child with elements of an Emotion Coaching parenting program.
This intervention will consist of a parent management training program called Helping the Noncompliant Child.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Child with oppositional defiant disorder and low prosocial emotions
Exclusion Criteria:
- Unable to speak/understand English
- Significant developmental delay or autism spectrum disorder

clinical_study.keyword: Children with ODD and low prosocial emotions

condition_browse.mesh_term: Attention Deficit and Disruptive Behavior Disorders
